body.p: Henry County, Kentucky native. Married to Charlotte Leonard Thomasson. Father of Nelson Thomasson, John J. Thomasson, Sarah Thomasson, and Laura Thomasson. Served in Captain Duncan's company in the War of 1812. Represented Harrison County, Indiana, in the State Legislature from 1818 to 1820. Served as City Attorney for Louisville and County Attorney. Elected to Congress as a Whig candidate and served from 1843 to 1847. Served in the Union Army in the Seventy-first Regiment, New York Volunteer Infantry.
